entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight except northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near mainland valleys and inlets overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
